question: Could Catecholaminergic Polymorphic Ventricular Tachycardia (CPVT) cause sudden cardiac death?
ideal_answer: Catecholaminergic polymorphic ventricular tachycardia (CPVT) is an inherited arrhythmogenic disease that can cause sudden cardiac death.
